definitions.definition: An element of the predicate of a sentence which complements the subject or object by means of the verb . Predicatives may be nominal or adjectival .
In some languages, a special part of speech used as a predicate and denoting a state of being.

main_definition: ( grammar ) An element of the predicate of a sentence which complements the subject or object by means of the verb . Predicatives may be nominal or adjectival .
